Articles.Content:
I had recorded a particular mission I flew in KSP--lots of footage, about 5 Gb worth--and I'm slowly editing it all into a cinematic.

Since it's a work in progress I'm reluctant to release it to the general public, but I am trying to find some constructive criticism and editing tips.

Is there anyone here who'd be willing to review my current workprint and give advice?

Thanks!
